meanings.definition: A person or thing that stinks.
meanings.sent1: My brother's socks are real stinkers!
meanings.sent2: The garbage can was full of stinkers.
meanings.sent3: The skunk thought the other animals were stinkers for not appreciating its perfume.
meanings.sent4: The team's performance was a real stinker, disappointing all the fans.
meanings.sent5: The stinkers in the fridge made everyone hold their noses.

meanings.definition: A film or book that is of poor quality.
meanings.sent1: I watched a movie last night, but it turned out to be one of those stinkers.
meanings.sent2: The critics agreed that the new release was a real stinker.
meanings.sent3: The comedy was supposed to be funny, but it ended up being a stinker.
meanings.sent4: The book was a stinker, with a predictable plot and flat characters.
meanings.sent5: The stinker of a film left the audience disappointed and bored.

meanings.sent1: The bathroom had a terrible stinker after someone forgot to flush.
meanings.sent2: The stinker from the garbage dump filled the air with an unpleasant smell.
meanings.sent3: The skunk sprayed its stinker, making everyone run away.
meanings.sent4: The stinker in the room was so strong that it made my eyes water.
meanings.sent5: The stinker coming from the kitchen hinted that something was burning.
